Click to Discover Meerkat Roles

This male and female lead the group and mother the pups. The female is dominant.

Helpers babysit the pups, teaching them everything from how to safely eat a scorpion to how to react to threats.

Meerkats are omnivores eating both plants and animals. They enjoy anything from fruit to insects and small mammals. Foragers will bring food back to the pups.

The sentry stands watch, looking for predators, while the others forage for food.

A pup is a Meerkat under 6 months old. they live in the burrow for the first 2-3 weeks and start foraging at 4-6 weeks.
